SELECT t1.pulverizer, t1.position, t1.running, t1.count FROM ( SELECT pulverizer. VALUE "pulverizer", position. VALUE "position", IF ( sum( IF ( ai.result_status != 4, 1, 0 ))> 0, '异常', '正常' ) "running", sum( IF ( ai.result_status != 4, 1, 0 )) "count", max( pulverizer.CODE ), max( position.CODE ) FROM ( SELECT * FROM pulverizer_point ORDER BY pulverizer_code, position_code ) pp LEFT JOIN alarm_information ai ON ( pp.id = ai.pulverizer_point_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM base_dict WHERE type = 'pulverizer' ) pulverizer ON pulverizer.CODE = pp.pulverizer_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM base_dict WHERE type = 'position' ) position ON position.CODE = pp.position_code GROUP BY pulverizer. VALUE , position. VALUE
ORDER BY max( pulverizer.CODE ), max( position.CODE ) ) t1
SELECT ai.* FROM alarm_information ai JOIN pulverizer_point pp ON ( ai.pulverizer_point_id = pp.id ) WHERE pp.pulverizer_code = #{pulverizerCode}
SELECT DISTINCT YEAR( alarm_time ) alarm_time FROM alarm_information ORDER BY alarm_time

SELECT IFNULL( count(*), 0 ) "0", IFNULL( sum( IF ( DATE_FORMAT( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '%Y%m%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( alarm_time, '%Y%m%d' ), 1, 0 )), 0 ) "1", IFNULL( sum( IF (( result_status < 3 OR result_status IS NULL ) AND ( verify_result = 2 OR verify_result IS NULL ), 1, 0 )), 0 ) "2", IFNULL( sum( IF ( result_status = 3, 1, 0 )), 0 ) "3", IFNULL( sum( IF (( result_status <= 3 OR result_status IS NULL ) AND ( verify_result = 2 OR verify_result IS NULL ), 1, 0 )), 0 ) "4" FROM alarm_information

select verify_result "verify_result", ifnull(getValue('pulverizer',pp.pulverizer_code),'其他') "pulverizerValue", count(1) "count" from alarm_information ai LEFT JOIN pulverizer_point pp ON ai.pulverizer_point_id = pp.id WHERE
#{pulverizerCode} = pp.pulverizer_code AND
YEAR(alarm_time) = #{year} AND
verify_result is not null AND verify_result in (1,2) GROUP BY verify_result,ifnull(getValue('pulverizer',pp.pulverizer_code),'其他')

SELECT ai.id "id", alarm_time "alarmTime", abnormal_code "abnormalCode", getValue ( 'abnormal', abnormal_code ) "abnormalValue", pulverizer_point_id "pulverizerPointId", pp.point_name "pointName", detection_value "detectionValue", ifnull(pp.pulverizer_code,ai.pulverizer_code) "pulverizerCode", getValue( 'pulverizer' ,ifnull(pp.pulverizer_code,ai.pulverizer_code)) "pulverizerValue" , count "count", alarm_description "alarmDescription", verify_result "verifyResult", CASE verify_result WHEN 1 THEN '误报' WHEN 2 THEN '真实故障' END "verifyResultValue", verify_description "verifyDescription", result_status "resultStatus", CASE result_status WHEN 1 THEN '核实中' WHEN 2 THEN '已核实' WHEN 3 THEN '处理中' WHEN 4 THEN '已处理' else '未处理' END "resultStatusValue", process_description "processDescription", finish_date "finishDate", ai.position_code "positionCode", possible_cause "possibleCause", proposal "proposal", getValue ( 'position', ai.position_code ) "positionValue", case when pulverizer_point_id is not null then pp.no -- todo 待补充逻辑 else ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( p.NO ) FROM alarm_point a LEFT JOIN pulverizer_point p ON pulverizer_point_id = p.id WHERE a.pulverizer_code = ifnull(pp.pulverizer_code,ai.pulverizer_code) AND abnormal_code = alarm_code ) end nos FROM alarm_information ai LEFT JOIN pulverizer_point pp ON ai.pulverizer_point_id = pp.id WHERE ai.id = #{id}
